response:
Urgent MRI will confirm the midbrain lesion and define aetiology (infarct, demyelination, haemorrhage, tumour). Vascular imaging evaluates posterior circulation. CSF and serologies assess demyelinating, inflammatory, or infectious causes. Stroke work-up screens for vascular risk and cardioembolism.
